text: @marcorubio @GovRonDeSantis This is a truck morgue, parked outside Mt Sinai. It's one of many. People who die of causes unrelated to covid-19 are also not being buried in a timely manner because of all the deaths. You go right on and have a nice sunny day. That Lord you pay lip service to you is watching. https://t.co/cak7gDtWWY

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
